column5:
This curation contains films under the Indie Horror genre. Movies are in alphabetically ascending order.

Mainstream horror films <i>(with some exceptions)<i>, while undeniably popular, often adhere to certain constraints, limiting explicit scenes and predominantly drawing from a well-established set of sub-genres with a proven track record.

On the contrary, Indie Horror films <i>(with some exceptions)<i>, known for their creative freedom and willingness to defy conventions, frequently eschew these limitations, exploring a diverse range of themes and approaches.

column2: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night
